description: Try our easy to follow Burgers 3 Ways: Chickpea & Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Zucchini,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar
name: Burgers 3 Ways: Chickpea & Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Drain 2 x 425g cans chickpeas and grate 2 zucchinis. Place half the chickpeas and half the zucchini into a food processor with 1 1/2 cups panko breadcrumbs, cup pesto and cup grated parmesan. Pulse to combine. Transfer to a bowl. Lightly mash reserved chickpeas and add to mixture with remaining zucchini. Season and mix. Divide into 6 patties and place on a tray. Cover with plastic and chill before using (see tip).
Fill buns with rocket, burger, mozzarella, semi-dried tomatoes and basil leaves.
